translations: 粗糙（度）；粗暴；猛烈；篷乱毛发；未加工

phrs.translation: 表面粗糙度；表面光洁度

sentences.sentence: She rested her cheek against the roughness of his jacket.
sentences.translation: 她把脸靠在了他粗糙的夹克上。

sentences.sentence: But you will not mind the roughness nor the steepness of the way.
sentences.translation: 你不会介意路途的不平或艰险。

sentences.sentence: The roughness of the world.He guards the sleep of his pauper master as if he.
sentences.translation: 手心；它舔舐无情的世界带给你的创伤和痛苦。它守护着乞丐主人入睡，仿佛他是王子。
